clues.text: The whale type of this fish can weigh as much as 2 elephants

rounds.comments: (Alex: These are definitions you will find in Webster's Third on that page.  Do you happen to have it with you?  I didn't think so.  So you have no advantage!)

clues.text: The Navy doesn't like to attribute the loss of the USS Cyclops to forces in this spooky area

clues.text: Right now I'm so jonesing for a batter-fried fish taco, the kind that originated on this Mexican peninsula

rounds.text: Seen with a piece of equipment, Bryn Mawr's 1st physical education director brought this sport to the U.S.; it shares part of its name with another sport
